categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation

nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 5

Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation 5 is the fifth issue of the canon comic book miniseries Solo: A Star Wars Story Adaptation, which adapts the film of the same name. The issue was written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published on February 20, 2019 by Marvel Comics.

THE KESSEL RUN! HAN and his crew pulled off an impossible heist…but will the EMPIRE stop them before their stolen unrefined coaxium explodes? Or will a monster waiting in the Maw prevent them making the Kessel Run in under twelve parsecs?!
